titleStmt.title: A Mystery of godlinesse and no cabala, or, A sincere account of the non-conformists conversation ... occasioned by a bitter and malitions [sic] paper called the Cabala.
titleStmt.author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes ascribed to Sir John Birkenhead. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
